mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NUM_NOTICE) FROM BOARD_NOTICE
WHERE ${searchKeyword} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'

SELECT BOARD_NUM_NOTICE , TITLE_NOTICE , CONTENT_NOTICE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE_NOTICE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS CREATE_DATE_NOTICE , WRITER_NOTICE , FILE_NAME_NOTICE , READ_CNT_NOTICE FROM BOARD_NOTICE WHERE BOARD_NUM_NOTICE = #{boardNumNotice}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_NOTICE SET READ_CNT_NOTICE = READ_CNT_NOTICE + 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM_NOTICE = #{boardNumNotice}
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_IMG_CODE , NOTICE_IMG_ORIGN_NAME , NOTICE_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , BOARD_NUM_NOTICE FROM NOTICE_IMG WHERE BOARD_NUM_NOTICE = #{boardNumNotice} ORDER BY NOTICE_IMG_CODE

SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NUM_FREE) FROM BOARD_FREE
WHERE ${searchKeyword} LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'

SELECT BOARD_NUM_FREE , TITLE_FREE , CONTENT_FREE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE_FREE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS CREATE_DATE_FREE , WRITER_FREE , FILE_NAME_FREE , READ_CNT_FREE , TEAM_CODE FROM BOARD_FREE B, MEMBER M WHERE B.WRITER_FREE = M.MEMBER_ID AND BOARD_NUM_FREE = #{boardNumFree}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_FREE SET READ_CNT_FREE = READ_CNT_FREE + 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM_FREE = #{boardNumFree}
mapper.select: SELECT FREE_IMG_CODE , FREE_IMG_ORIGN_NAME , FREE_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , BOARD_NUM_FREE FROM FREE_IMG WHERE BOARD_NUM_FREE = #{boardNumFree} ORDER BY FREE_IMG_CODE
